Package delano

Class MinimalPerfectHashFunction

java.lang.Object
delano.MinimalPerfectHashFunction
public class MinimalPerfectHashFunction
extends java.lang.Object
The Class MinimalPerfectHashFunction. The purpose is to create a MPHF using Cichelli's Method on the keywords examined

    • CountLettersFirstAndLast

    • h

      public int h​(java.lang.String word)
      h function = = (length(word) + g*(firstletter(word)) + g*(lastletter(word))) % size
      Parameters:
      word - the keyword running through the h function
      Returns:
      the int value resulting from the h function

    • InitializeGValues

      public static void InitializeGValues()
      Initialize G values. Set every letter from the frequency hash map to 0 as g values initially are set to 0

    • keywordValues

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> keywordValues()
      Keyword values.
      Returns:
      the hash map with each keyword and their respective value based on the MPHF
